text: o visvasulara! Miru allah ku vidheyulai undandi; mariyu ayana sandesaharuniki vidheyulai undandi mariyu milo adhikaram appagincabadina variki kuda! Mi madhya e visayanlonaina abhipraya bhedam kaligite - miru allah nu antimadinanni visvasince vare ayite - a visayanni allah ku mariyu pravaktaku nivedincandi. Ide saraina pad'dhati mariyu phalitanni batti kuda uttamamainadi
